title: create ArrayList object to hold Integers

content.description: Consider the following statement, which is intended to create an ArrayList named numbers that can be used to store Integer values.
content.question: ArrayList<Integer> numbers = /* missing code */; Which of the following can be used to replace /* missing code */ so that the statement works as intended? new Integer() new ArrayList<Integer> new ArrayList<Integer>()

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
